trustfund: TF029688-PHRD-STRUCTURAL ADJUSTMENT LOAN,TF033634-LATVIA - STRUCTURAL ADJUSTMENT LOAN,TF033606-LATVIA - STRUCTURAL ADJUSTMENT

abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Structural
            Adjustment Loan (SAL) Project for Latvia is to support the
            restoration of sustained growth and improved living
            standards through structural policies that promote efficient
            private sector development and improve the management of
            public sector resources. The main policy areas to be
            supported by the SAL are: a) adopting and maintaining a
            macroeconomic framework for stable growth; b) encouraging
            efficient growth by expediting privatization, enforcing
            financial discipline on banks and enterprises, and improving
            market efficiency; and c) reforming public sector resources
            management by rationalizing expenditure decisions, reforming
            local finances to improve the delivery and cost
            effectiveness of municipal and social services, reforming
            social insurance, improving tax administration, and
            strengthening institutional capacity for public finance management.
